info.name: Equipment Management System - Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Equipment Management System with authentication, 2FA, equipment management, loans, reservations, maintenance, and admin operations

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user. Returns JWT token on success.
Login with username and password. Returns JWT token. If 2FA is enabled, will return 401 with message requiring 2FA code.
Login with 2FA code. Use this when user has 2FA enabled. totpCode is the 6-digit code from authenticator app.
Login using a recovery code instead of TOTP code. Use when authenticator app is unavailable.
Reset password for a user. Requires username and new password.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and password reset.

item.name: Two-Factor Authentication

exec: pm.test("Response has secret and QR URL", function () {

request.description: Initiate 2FA setup. Returns secret and QR code URL. Scan QR code with Google Authenticator.
Verify 2FA code and complete setup. Returns recovery codes. Save these codes securely!
Disable 2FA for the current user.

item.description: Two-factor authentication endpoints for enabling, verifying, and disabling 2FA.

request.description: Get current user's profile information.
Update current user's profile (name, email). All fields are optional.

item.name: User Equipment

request.description: Get all available equipment (status = AVAILABLE).

query.description: Filter by status (AVAILABLE, BORROWED, MAINTENANCE, RETIRED)

request.description: Search and filter equipment with pagination. All query parameters are optional.
Get all equipment currently borrowed by the authenticated user.
Borrow equipment. Body is optional - can include expectedReturnDate (YYYY-MM-DD format).
Borrow equipment without specifying return date. Uses default loan duration.
Return borrowed equipment.
Get loan rules configuration (max loans per user, duration limits, etc.).

item.description: User equipment operations: browse, search, borrow, and return equipment.

request.description: Create a new equipment reservation. startDate and endDate are required (YYYY-MM-DD format).
Get all reservations for the current user.
Cancel a reservation. Only works for PENDING or CONFIRMED reservations.

item.name: Admin - Users

request.description: Get all users. Requires ADMIN role.

query.description: Search in benutzername, vorname, nachname, email
Filter by status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED, PENDING)

request.description: Search and filter users with pagination. Requires ADMIN role.
Update user role and/or account status. Requires ADMIN role. Both fields are optional.
Delete a user. Requires ADMIN role. Cannot delete users with active loans.

item.description: Admin user management endpoints. All require ADMIN role and Bearer token.

item.name: Admin - Equipment

request.description: Get all equipment (all statuses). Requires ADMIN role.
Search and filter equipment with pagination. Requires ADMIN role.

body.raw:
{
    "inventarnummer": "TEST001",
    "bezeichnung": "Test Equipment",
    "category": "LAPTOP",
    "status": "AVAILABLE",
    "conditionStatus": "NEW",
    "location": "Lab A",
    "serialNumber": "SN123456",
    "description": "Test equipment for API testing"
}

request.description: Add new equipment. Requires ADMIN role. inventarnummer and bezeichnung are required.
Update equipment. Requires ADMIN role. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.
Delete equipment. Requires ADMIN role.

item.description: Admin equipment management endpoints. All require ADMIN role.

item.name: Admin - Loans

request.description: Get all currently active loans. Requires ADMIN role.
Get complete loan history (all returned loans). Requires ADMIN role.
Get all overdue loans (past expected return date). Requires ADMIN role.

item.description: Admin loan management endpoints. All require ADMIN role.

item.name: Admin - Maintenance

request.description: Schedule maintenance for equipment. Requires ADMIN role. Type: ROUTINE, REPAIR, INSPECTION, CLEANING, CALIBRATION, UPGRADE, OTHER
Start a scheduled maintenance. Changes status from SCHEDULED to IN_PROGRESS. Requires ADMIN role.
Complete a maintenance. Changes status from IN_PROGRESS to COMPLETED. Requires ADMIN role.
Get maintenance history for a specific equipment. Requires ADMIN role.
Get all scheduled maintenance (status = SCHEDULED). Requires ADMIN role.
Get all overdue maintenance (past scheduled date, not completed). Requires ADMIN role.
Get maintenance records by status. Status values: SCHEDULED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, OVERDUE. Requires ADMIN role.

item.description: Admin maintenance management endpoints. All require ADMIN role.

item.name: Admin - Reservations

request.description: Get all pending reservations. Requires ADMIN role.
Get all reservations for a specific equipment. Requires ADMIN role.
Confirm a pending reservation. Changes status from PENDING to CONFIRMED. Requires ADMIN role.

item.description: Admin reservation management endpoints. All require ADMIN role.
